emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient 'smør' (butter) is a direct match to 'smør, saltet' (salted butter). Both are dairy products with similar processing, and 'smør, saltet' has the highest emission factor among the butter options, aligning with the rule to choose the highest emission factor when processing levels are similar.

The ingredient 'rødbeder' (beetroots) is a direct match to 'rødbede' (beetroot). Both are raw vegetables, and 'rødbede' represents the least processed form among the options, aligning with the rule to choose the least processed option when no processing is specified.

The ingredient 'mørk balsamicoeddike' (dark balsamic vinegar) is a type of vinegar, making 'eddike' (vinegar) the most appropriate broader category. This aligns with the rule to use a broader category when an exact match is not available, and it makes sense from a CO2 emission perspective as both are fermented products.

The ingredient 'sukker' (sugar) is a direct match to 'sukker, stødt melis (saccharose)' (granulated sugar (saccharose)). Both are forms of sugar, and 'sukker, stødt melis (saccharose)' has the highest emission factor among the sugar options, aligning with the rule to choose the highest emission factor when processing levels are similar.

The ingredient 'torskeloin' (cod loin) is a specific cut of cod, making 'torsk, filet' (cod, fillet) the closest match. Both are forms of cod fish, and 'torsk, filet' represents a similar processing level (filleted fish) to a loin cut.

The ingredient 'smør' (butter) is a direct match to 'smør, saltet' (salted butter). Both are dairy products with similar processing, and 'smør, saltet' has the highest emission factor among the butter options, aligning with the rule to choose the highest emission factor when processing levels are similar.

The ingredient 'hvedemel' (wheat flour) is a direct match to 'hvedemel, grahamsmel, fuldkorn' (wheat flour, wholemeal flour, whole grain). Both are types of wheat flour, and 'hvedemel, grahamsmel, fuldkorn' is a suitable match as it represents a common form of wheat flour.
The ingredient 'vand' (water) is a direct match to 'vand, postevand' (water, tap water). Water has a CO2 emission factor of 0.

The ingredient 'hele gule sennepsfrø' (whole yellow mustard seeds) are seeds, making 'sesamfrø, afskallede' (sesame seeds, hulled) the closest match. Both are seeds and are minimally processed. 'Sesamfrø, afskallede' has the highest emission factor among the seed options, aligning with the rule to choose the highest emission factor when processing levels are similar.

The ingredient 'finthakkede skalotteløg' (finely chopped shallots) is a type of onion, making 'løg, hakkede, dybfrost' (onions, chopped, frozen) the closest match. Both are processed forms of onions (chopped), and 'løg, hakkede, dybfrost' is a suitable match for chopped shallots.

The ingredient 'koldt smør' (cold butter) is a direct match to 'smør, saltet' (salted butter). Both are dairy products with similar processing, and 'smør, saltet' has the highest emission factor among the butter options, aligning with the rule to choose the highest emission factor when processing levels are similar.

The ingredient 'friske krydderurter' (fresh herbs) is a general category. 'Persille' (parsley) is a common fresh herb and represents a suitable match for fresh herbs in general. It is also the least processed option among the available herbs.

The ingredient 'stegte bacontern' (fried bacon cubes) is a form of bacon, making 'grisekød, bacon, stegestykke' (pork, bacon, frying piece) the closest match. Both are pork-based bacon products, and 'grisekød, bacon, stegestykke' represents a similar processing level (bacon for frying).

The ingredient 'blødkogte vagtelæg' (soft-boiled quail eggs) are eggs, making 'æg, skrabeæg' (eggs, free-range eggs) the closest match. Both are types of eggs, and 'æg, skrabeæg' represents a general category for eggs, which is suitable for quail eggs.
